MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Crowton.  Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extensive repairs to the pole and overhead line, and difficulties with traffic management. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.28PM on 16th November 2020
